For the foregoing reasons, the Court grants plaintiffs' motion for leave to file a surreply [docket no.  893 ]; denies plaintiffs' motion for an adverse inference and sanctions [docket no.  743 ]; and grants the defendants' motion for summary judgment [docket no.  739 ]. The Clerk is directed to enter judgment in favor of defendants.(pjg, )
